mapper.select: SELECT ur.resource_id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.resource_category_id categoryId FROM admin_role ar LEFT JOIN role r ON ar.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_resource rrr ON r.role_id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN resource ur ON ur.resource_id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.resource_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.resource_id
SELECT DISTINCT ar.admin_id FROM role_resource rr LEFT JOIN admin_role ar ON rr.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}
